attributes.title: THE TRAUMA
attributes.review: I cannot even begin to explain my disappointment that accompanied this horrendous app. I was SO excited to finally be a part of the sexism and racism plaguing this country; not to mention the learn more about the lack of leadership regarding COVID. I was so excited as I sit here waiting for the app to download. But it took hours! The wait was just tremendous and I waited for billions and billions of days. FINALLY I got the app but it wanted my phone number?? Like WHAT kind of propaganda and exploitation I this? That wasnâ€™t even the worst part!! I started to notice the appâ€™s influence infiltrating my life a little more everyday. I noticed the paint on the walls becoming a little more orange and my poor dogâ€™s hair turned orange and was balding!! When I woke up the next morning, my entire house and everything in it was orange. Appalled, I immediately deleted the app hoping to reverse the new damage. However, itâ€™s gonna take some serious BLUE influence to reverse this. If anyone has experienced the same trauma due to this app please reach out as there are grounds for a class action law suit to get our billions and billions.
